professional_summary: Certified Scrum Master with extensive experience in agile methodologies, database administration, and process optimization. Proven ability to bridge business and technology gaps through effective project management and leadership.

key_responsibilities: Facilitating Scrum ceremonies and leading agile teams.
Implementing Scrum and Kanban practices to improve workflows.
Collaborating with stakeholders to identify and resolve issues.
Leading Scrum teams and driving agile transformation.
Adapting Scrum practices to meet organizational goals.
Providing training and mentorship to team members.
